entry.def: Sewing is the activity of making or mending clothes or other things using a needle and thread.

example.ex: Her mother had always done all the sewing.
example.tran: 所有的针线活一直都是她母亲来做。

entry.def: Sewing is clothes or other things that are being sewn.

example.ex: We all got out our own sewing and sat in front of the log fire.
example.tran: 我们都把自己的针线活拿出来，坐到了火堆前。

sentences.sentence: "she put her sewing back in the basket"

auth_sentence.content: Eddie ridicules Rodolfo's skill at cooking and sewing.

sentences.en: Cooking,sewing,and house keeping are household arts.
sentences.cn: 煮饭、缝衣和料理家务都是持家的艺术。

sentences.en: I hate having to fetch out the sewing machine every time I want to do some sewing.
sentences.cn: 每当我想做点针线活时就得把缝纫机搬出来,真讨厌。
